name: ITX 215.01.E - PAYE Withheld Part 2
query:
select 
min(ss.start_date) as "Start Date::100", 
max(ss.end_date) as "End Date::100", 
ss.employee as "Employee No:Data:0",
ss.employee_name as "Employee Name:Data:0",
sum(if (sd.salary_component = 'Basic', sd.amount, 0)) as "Basic Salary:Currency:0",
sum(if (sd.salary_component = 'Housing', sd.amount, 0)) as "Housing:Currency:0",
sum(if (sd.salary_component = 'TI', sd.amount, 0)) as "Other Allw and Benefits:Currency:0",
sum(ss.gross_pay) as "Gross Pay:Currency:0",
sum(if (sd.salary_component = 'NSSF', sd.amount, 0)) as "NSSF:Currency:0",
sum(if (sd.salary_component = 'PAYE', sd.amount, 0)) as "PAYE:Currency:0",
ss.company as "Company:Data:0",
cmp.tax_id as "TIN:Data:0",
cmp.email as "Email:Data:0",
cmp.phone_no as "Phone:Data:0",
cmp.fax as "Fax Number:Data:0",
cmp.p_o_box as "P O Box:Data:0",
cmp.street as "Street:Data:0",
cmp.plot_number as "Plot Number:Data:0",
cmp.block_number as "Block Number:Data:0"
from `tabSalary Slip` ss  left outer join `tabSalary Detail` sd on sd.parent = ss.name 
			  left outer join `tabCompany` cmp on ss.company = cmp.name 
where ss.start_date >= %(from_date)s
  and ss.end_date <= %(to_date)s
group by ss.employee_name
having sum(ss.gross_pay) > 0
